Now as never before, experience all the lust and desire of having sex with one of the most beautiful woman in the world who happens to be a Porn Star, Jill Kelly. Interact with her using your DVD Remote! You choose the sexual positions! You choose the camera angles! You choose her moods between innocent and nasty! You ask her to strip naked for you! You ask her to tell you her wildest sex stories! Enter Jills world where FantaVR allows you to control this gorgeous sexual animal and enjoy her countless times. The Virtual Sex Series has redefined interactive sex. Virtual Sex with Jill Kelly is the most advanced cyber sex simulator on DVD.
